Pemkot Malang Libatkan Kaum Disabilitas dalam Perencanaan Pembangunan
07 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Hanum Oktavia


Pemkot Malang Libatkan Kaum Disabilitas dalam Perencanaan Pembangunan

KBRN, Malang: Perencanaan pembangunan Kota Malang kini melibatkan sejumlah kelompok masyarakat. Diantaranya kaum disabilitas, anak-anak, pemuda, hingga warga lanjut usia (lansia). Hal itu tertuang dalam pra musrenbang tematik yang digelar oleh Badan Perencanaan Penelitian dan Pengembangan (Barenlitbang) Kota Malang. Musrenbang tematik ini sendiri memang sengaja dilakukan agar usulan yag masuk ke pemerintah bisa fokus sesuai dengan segmen masing-masing.
Untuk pra musrenbang disabilitas telah digelar pada Kamis (7/11/2019).
Forum ini dihadiri oleh perwakilan syair holder terkait, serta beberapa perwakilan warga penyandang disabilitas di kota pendidikan. Melalui forum ini, diharapkan mampu melahirkan usulan-usulan demi pembangunan Kota Malang yang ramah bagi kaum disabilitas, sekaligus mendorong partisipasi warga disabilitas dalam pembangunan.
“Musrenbang disabilitas ini bertujuan untuk mengakomodir usulan-usulan dari warga disabilitas, sehingga nanti pada saat musrenbang pada Januari 2020 mendatang, kita sudah tahu apa saja kebutuhan disabilitas ini. Program dan rencana anggarannya bisa disusun,” kata Kepala Barenlitbang Kota Malang, Dwi Rahayu.
Program ini tak hanya menyangkut kegiatan saja, namun juga mencakup pemenuhan kebutuhan fasilitas bagi kaum disabilitas. Pasalnya, selama ini fasilitas pelayanan publik di Kota Malang masih belum sepenuhnya ramah terhadap kaum disabilitas. 
“Usulan ini akan menjadi rekomendasi bagi Organisasi Perangkat Daerah (OPD) agar membangun fasilitas yang ramah bagi disabilitas. Untuk di kantor Balaikota Malang misalnya, belum ada fasilitas tangga bagi warga tuna daksa, di pelayanan kesehatan pun juga begitu. Harapannya ke depan, puskesmas-puskesmas di Kota Malang punya kelengkapan fasilitas serupa,” tuturnya.
Berdasarkan data Bidang Kesehjateraan Rakyat (Kesra) Provinsi Jawa Timur, jumlah warga disabilitas di Jawa Timur sebanyak 14 ribu orang. Sementara di Kota Malang, tercatat ada seribuan warga.
Sementara itu, Ketua Komisi C DPRD Kota Malang, Fathol Arifin menilai masih ada sejumlah fasilitas publik yang perlu dibenahi, sehingga ramah untuk kaum disabilitas. “Kami berharap pemerintah ke depannya lebih memperhatikan fasilitas umum untuk warga disable, kebijakan-kebijakannya juga harus ramah untuk mereka,” ungkap politisi PKB ini.

Malang City Government Involves Disability Persons in Development Planning
Nov 7 2019, 1:00 p.m. by Hanum Oktavia


Malang City Government Involves Disability Persons in Development Planning

KBRN, Malang: Malang City development planning now involves a number of community groups. Among people with disabilities, children, young people, to the elderly (elderly). This was stated in the thematic pre-musrenbang held by the Malang City Research and Development Planning Agency (Barenlitbang). The thematic Musrenbang itself is deliberately carried out so that proposals that enter the government can focus in accordance with their respective segments.
For pre-Musrenbang, disability has been held on Thursday (11/07/2019).
The forum was attended by representatives of relevant poet holders, as well as representatives of people with disabilities in the city of education. Through this forum, it is expected to be able to produce proposals for the development of Malang City which is friendly for people with disabilities, as well as encourage the participation of people with disabilities in development.
"This disability musrenbang aims to accommodate the proposals from people with disabilities, so that later when the Musrenbang in January 2020 comes, we already know what these disability needs are. The program and budget plan can be arranged, "said Head of Malang Research and Development Agency, Dwi Rahayu.
This program does not only involve activities, but also includes meeting the needs of facilities for people with disabilities. Because, so far the public service facilities in Malang are still not fully friendly to people with disabilities.
"This proposal will be a recommendation for the Regional Apparatus Organization (OPD) to build facilities that are friendly for people with disabilities. For example, at the Malang City Hall office, for example, there are no stairs facilities for people with disabilities, even in health services. Hopefully in the future, the puskesmas in Malang have similar facilities, "he said.
Based on data from the Public Health Sector (Kesra) of East Java Province, the number of people with disabilities in East Java is 14 thousand people. While in Malang, there were thousands of residents.
Meanwhile, Chairperson of Malang City DPRD Commission C, Fathol Arifin assessed that there are still a number of public facilities that need to be improved, so that they are friendly for people with disabilities. "We hope the government will pay more attention to public facilities for disabled citizens in the future, their policies must also be friendly to them," said the PKB politician.
